TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Label extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the name of a object in a specific language.

remarks.para: Aterm can have one or more labels in the default language, and zero or more labels in the non-default language. If the term has labels in a language, one of the labels must be the default label.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

remarks.para: The current user must have TaxonomyRights.EditTerm permission to use the method. Call the method to save this change to the database.

Docs.exception: The current user has insufficient permissions to perform this operation.
The default label for a object in the default language cannot be deleted. Deleting the last Label of a Term is disallowed. Please delete the Term instead.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDefaultForLanguage As Boolean
public: property bool IsDefaultForLanguage { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Indicates whether this object is the default label for the label's language.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Language { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Language : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates the locale of the current object.

remarks.para: The current user must have TaxonomyRights.EditTerm permission in order to set this property. Call the method to save this change to the database.

Docs.exception: The current user has insufficient permissions to perform this operation.
The language of a default Label cannot be changed.
The language is not a valid language or is not one of the working languages for the current term store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetAsDefaultForLanguage() cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the current object as the default label for its language.

remarks.para: The current user must have TaxonomyRights.EditTerm permission in order to use this method. Call the method to save this change to the database.

Docs.exception: The current user has insufficient permissions to perform this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Term As Term
public: property Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::Term ^ Term { Microsoft::SharePoint::Taxonomy::Term ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the object that the current object is associated with.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Value : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the current object.

remarks.para: The current user must have TaxonomyRights.EditTerm permission to set this property. Call the method to save this change to the database.

Docs.exception: The current user has insufficient permissions to perform this operation.

The value is not valid for a Term Label. The Label can not have more than 255 characters, and cannot contain any invalid characters including: semicolon, double quote, left angle bracket, right angle bracket, ampersand, pipe, and tab.
